text.1: The doctors of Professor Mateev's clinic professionally eliminate defects and restore the necessary body functions. Specifically, congenital limb defects include their absence or incomplete development, extra or abnormally developed limbs that are present from birth.
text.2: Leave a request and we will provide you with a free online consultation.
text.3: Love of beauty is taste, creation of beauty is art
text.4: If you have additional questions about the clinic, website, types of surgery, and so on, write to us, and we will try to answer you as soon as possible. If you want to sign up for a consultation, then click on the 'Request a call' button
text.5: Mateev Musa Asypbekovich - doctor of the highest category and doctor of medical sciences. Has over 42 years of experience!
text.6: You leave us a request where you indicate your personal data
text.7: Soon we will contact you by the phone number you specified.
text.8: Consultation takes place on the topic of interest and the operation. We will discuss all the terms and processes.
text.10: Interesting articles on the topic of plastic surgery. Where can you find out better about the existing types of plastic surgery.
text.13: We will try to answer your question as soon as possible.
